snippet.title: Last Train Home | Soldier Experience Trailer
snippet.description:
In the epic struggle for survival, armed with priceless skills, your soldiers navigate dangerous battlegrounds and the roaring armored train. Every one of them is irreplaceable. How many shall prevail and return to their cherished homeland?

Last Train Home, a survival strategy game inspired by the story of Czechoslovak Legionaries, is coming to PC on November 28.
 
Learn more: lasttrainhome.thqnordic.com

- Links & Info -
Steam: https://thqn.net/lth-steam
Website: https://lasttrainhome.thqnordic.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/lasttrain

- Our Socials -
YouTube:   @thqnordic  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/THQNordic
Facebook: https://facebook.com/lasttrainhomegame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/lasttrainhomegame
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@thqnordic
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/thqnordic

#LastTrainHome
